text: Main API latency spikes during peak hours. Performance issues reported: API gateway shows 500ms+ latency during peak traffic. Database connection pool exhaustion. Memory leaks in user service.

text: Vector Database Technology Evaluation. Vector database technologies discussed in architecture review: Pinecone for managed vector search, Milvus for self-hosted deployment, Qdrant for high-performance retrieval. Comparing pgvector as PostgreSQL extension versus dedicated vector databases like Weaviate and ChromaDB.

props.title: Vector Database Technology Evaluation
props.content: Vector database technologies discussed in architecture review: Pinecone for managed vector search, Milvus for self-hosted deployment, Qdrant for high-performance retrieval. Comparing pgvector as PostgreSQL extension versus dedicated vector databases like Weaviate and ChromaDB.
props.author: Tech Architecture Team

text: Embedding Search Infrastructure Design. Vector database technologies under consideration: Evaluating Pinecone vs Milvus for semantic search. Qdrant shows promising benchmark results. pgvector provides cost-effective solution for moderate scale. Also reviewing Vespa and Vald.
